settings.f_content:
• 11 to 88 lbs per adjustable dumbbell
  • Space Efficiency: Replaces up to 12 sets of weights, freeing up your workout space.
  • Rapid Weight Adjustment: Weights can be adjusted simultaneously from either side with the innovative Dial Tech system.
  • Durability Guaranteed: Constructed with laser-cut steel plates and a reinforced base for lasting use.

In-stock orders are processed within 24 hours, with delivery typically taking 3-7 business days. Please note, we do not accept returns but offer replacements for defective products.

Click here to view more details.

Liberty insurance coverage

We’ve partnered with Liberty Insurance to provide coverage for injuries resulting from product defects or malfunctions during training, up to 4 million. (Coverage applies only to dumbbell products purchased directly from the Ativafit website.)

• Please adjust weights on the trays for safety.
  • Hold down the red safety button to unlock the weights. Meanwhile, adjust the dial until the arrow points exactly to the desired weight number to complete the weight switch process.
  • Make sure the red button fully bounces up to lock the weights before lifting the dumbbell.
  • Please do not drop or throw the dumbbells after use.

• 2x 88lbs Adjustable Dumbbells

settings.slidetext: Laser-cut steel plates, precision-engineered for a premium feel and performance.

settings.title: Laser-cut steel plates, are precision-engineered for a premium feel and performance.

settings.slidetext: Elevate from a solid 11 lbs to an impressive 88 lbs, catering to diverse training requirements, from foundational exercises to heavy lifting.
Our advanced dumbbells enable simultaneous weight changes on both sides, streamlining your workout experience without the hassle.
With dimensions of 15.9"L x 9"W x 9.4"H, these adjustable dumbbells are incredibly space-efficient, transforming any small corner into a versatile workout zone.

Our laser-cut steel plates ensure optimal balance and uniform weight distribution for smooth lifting. Designed for home workouts, the compact structure of our dumbbells offers substantial weight without the bulkiness, allowing for a streamlined workout experience.

Designed for comfort and adaptability, our dumbbells feature ergonomic handles suitable for any hand size, enhancing grip for all exercises. Its compact form allows easy integration with accessories to convert into barbells or kettlebells, expanding your workout versatility without taking up extra space.
Constructed from premium steel and fortified plastic, these dumbbells are designed for enduring performance and resistance to wear and tear.
Featuring an enhanced locking mechanism, these dumbbells guarantee secure weight retention for safety and peace of mind during intense sessions.

Seamlessly transition between weights with our innovative Dial Tech, allowing for quick adjustments in 7 lbs increments across a versatile range from 11 to 88 lbs. This feature not only enables targeted intensity adjustments for varied exercises but also ensures a fluid, uninterrupted workout experience, perfectly blending efficiency with precision.

settings.heading: Flex Your Fitness: Anywhere, Anytime
settings.subheading: The Home Gym That Keeps You Moving
settings.scene_text_01: The 66lb dumbbells are heavy enough to challenge even the most experienced lifters. They're perfect for compound exercises like squats, deadlifts, and bench presses, which work multiple muscle groups at once.
settings.scene_text_02: The adjustable weight range allows you to target specific muscle groups with isolation exercises like bicep curls, tricep extensions, and shoulder raises.
settings.scene_text_03: 66lb dumbbells can be used to perform functional exercises like dumbbell swings, clean and presses, and box jumps. These exercises are great for improving your overall fitness and athleticism.
settings.scene_text_04: The 66lb dumbbells can be used to add intensity to your cardio workouts. Try doing dumbbell swings, cleans, or presses for intervals to burn calories and improve your cardiovascular health.
settings.scene_text_05: High-intensity interval training (HIIT) is a great way to burn fat and improve your fitness. The 66lb dumbbells can be used to perform HIIT exercises like dumbbell burpees, snatches, or jerk.

settings.question: What is the weight range of the Ativafit 88lbs dumbbells?
settings.answer: The Ativafit 88lbs dumbbells boast an expansive weight range from 11 to 88lbs, making them the ideal choice for both budding enthusiasts and seasoned athletes looking to push their limits.

settings.question: How can I adjust the weight on the Ativafit 88lbs dumbbells?
settings.answer: Adjusting the weight on the Ativafit 88lbs dumbbells is straightforward with the innovative Dial Tech system. Simply rotate the dial to your desired weight setting, allowing for swift transitions and a seamless workout experience.

settings.question: Can I count on the durability of the Ativafit 88lbs dumbbells?
settings.answer: Absolutely. The Ativafit 88lbs dumbbells are constructed with premium steel and a sturdy, reinforced base, ensuring they can endure rigorous workouts. The ergonomic handles are designed for comfort and secure grip, enhancing your training sessions.

settings.question: Are the Ativafit 88lbs dumbbells user-friendly?
settings.answer: Yes, they are designed with ease of use in mind. The compact and efficient design makes them simple to adjust, store, and transport, offering a hassle-free addition to your fitness regimen.

settings.question: What advantages do I gain from training with 88lbs dumbbells?
settings.answer:
Utilizing Ativafit 88lbs dumbbells in your routine brings numerous benefits:
- Expanded exercise options from strength to cardio.
- Cost-effective solution for a comprehensive home gym setup. solution for
- Space-saving design ideal for any home environment.

settings.question: What should I do if my dumbbells arrive damaged?
settings.answer: If your dumbbells arrive in less than perfect condition, contact our customer support within 12 hours of delivery. We are committed to resolving any issues promptly, providing replacements or refunds as needed. Be sure to include photos of the damage for quicker resolution.

settings.question: Is it possible to return or exchange the dumbbells after purchase?
settings.answer: We currently do not accept returns for our 88lbs dumbbells. However, we are committed to ensuring your satisfaction. If you encounter any quality issues or require replacements, please reach out to us at services@ativafit.com, and we'll be more than happy to assist you.

settings.question: What does the 2-year warranty cover for the dumbbells?
settings.answer: Our comprehensive 2-year warranty safeguards against manufacturing defects and functional issues with the dumbbells, ensuring your investment is protected. It excludes wear and tear and damage from misuse, focusing on keeping your workouts consistent and worry-free.

settings.question: What's included in the "Protection Plan"?
settings.answer: The Ativafit Protection Plan, in collaboration with Liberty Insurance, offers an added layer of security, covering accidental injuries from product malfunctions up to $4 million. It's an excellent way to enjoy peace of mind during every workout with Ativafit.

settings.heading: Ativafit Personalized Plan Quick Registration
settings.text: Welcome to the first step in your Ativafit personalized journey! By providing some basic information, you're on your way to getting a fitness and nutrition plan tailored just for you. Please fill out this quick registration form, and our team will be in touch to dive deeper into your lifestyle and workout habits, ensuring a detailed and specific plan is crafted to meet your needs.
